X.ii.6.D.3.h
.
Proposals on Which a Beneficiary Takes No Action
If a beneficiary does not respond to notice of a proposed rating of incompetency within 65 days of the date of the notice, the hub of jurisdiction makes a final decision regarding the beneficiaryâ€™s competency based on the evidence of record.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section D - Processing Awards to Incompetent Beneficiaries
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section D
